groups.label: WindowWait_Save_ImageDb_OverNumFolders
groups.text:
Cannot save because the
SD card contains too many
video/image folders.

Please delete any
unwanted folders in
Nintendo 3DS Camera.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_CreateFolder_NothingFreeSpace
groups.text:
There is not enough free space
on the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteIconFile
groups.text: Saving icon...

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_DeleteFolder_Success
groups.text: Deleting folder...

groups.label: WindowWait_SaveDataLoadError_Verificate
groups.text:
The save data is corrupted
and will be reset.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_Write_NothingFreeSpace
groups.text:
Could not save because
there is not enough free
space on the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_Save_WriteGifAviFile_MemoryError
groups.text:
Cannot save because there
is not enough free space on
the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_WarningFullFolder
groups.text:
All the folders are full, so you
cannot save any more Flipnotes.
Please delete unwanted
Flipnotes to free up some
space.

groups.label: WindowWait_Save_WriteJpeg
groups.text:
Saving file...

Do not turn off the power
or remove the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_Folder_OverPath
groups.text:
There is another folder
with the same name.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_InvalidList
groups.text:
The management file was
corrupted and has been
deleted.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_OutputConfirmAvi_Ok
groups.text: Save

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteGifAviFile
groups.text:
Saving file...
(This may take a while.)

Do not turn off the power
or remove the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_DeleteMemo
groups.text: Deleting Flipnote...

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteMemoFile_OverPath
groups.text:
This Flipnote cannot be saved
because there is already a
Flipnote with this filename on
the SD card. Try saving the
Flipnote to a different folder.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteMemoFile
groups.text: Saving Flipnote...

groups.label: WindowWait_Draw_IllustMode
groups.text:
This mode allows you to treat
three separate layers as one.

Use this when you want to add
colour regardless of layer order,
or when you want to move
all your layers at once.

groups.label: WindowWait_Config_AllDelete_End
groups.text:
All Flipnotes and folders
have been deleted.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_Failure
groups.text: Could not access the SD card.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_OutputConfirm_Cancel
groups.text: Cancel

groups.label: WindowWait_SaveData_NewCreating
groups.text: Creating new save data...

groups.label: WindowWait_SampleMemoCopy_FolderFull
groups.text:
The Home folder is full.

Some of the sample Flipnotes
could not be copied.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteGifAviFile_CancelButton
groups.text: Cancel

groups.label: WindowWait_Initialize_Ready
groups.text: Preparing...

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_ReadIconFile_Failure
groups.text: The icon cannot be read.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Lock_TextSet
groups.text:
Select Lock to prevent other users
from editing your Flipnote.

Please note that locked Flipnotes may
still be re-sent or posted to the internet
by the receiver or by a third party.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_OutputConfirm
groups.text:
Saving in this format
may take some time.

Do you want to start saving?

groups.label: WindowWait_DefaultButton
groups.text: OK

groups.label: WindowWait_Save_WriteGifAviFile_MemoryErrorStop
groups.text:
Could not save all data
because there is not enough
free space on the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_Initialize_CloseApplication
groups.text:
Please press ÓÅ≥, and
then close this software.

In order to play this software,
you must either download
the newest version or
reset the save data.

groups.label: WindowWait_SaveDataLoadError_Failed
groups.text:
An unexpected error
occurred while reading
the save data.

groups.label: WindowWait_SaveDataWriteError_Failed
groups.text:
An unexpected error
occurred while writing
the save data.

groups.label: WindowWait_SaveDataWriting
groups.text: Saving...

groups.label: WindowWait_WarningSdCardFreeSpace
groups.text:
The SD card is
running low on space.

Please free up some space.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_MoveMemoFile_OverPath
groups.text:
The transfer could not be
completed because a Flipnote
with the same filename exists
in the destination folder.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteMemoOrListFile_NothingFreeSpace
groups.text:
Could not save Flipnote or
management file because
there is not enough free
space on the SD card.

groups.label: WindowWait_Config_AllDelete
groups.text: Deleting...

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_ReadMemoFile_Failure
groups.text: Could not read the Flipnote.

groups.label: WindowWait_AccessResult_WriteList
groups.text: Saving the management file...
